definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: When you share a page, you can designate users as viewers or editors.
sentences.chinese: 在共享页面时，您可以将用户指定为查看者或编辑者。

sentences.english: Is your focus on productivity starting to make you feel miserable or stressed out?
sentences.chinese: 如果你追求效能时开始感到痛苦或是精疲力竭？

sentences.english: She was thunderstruck to hear the news.
sentences.chinese: 得知消息时她大感惊讶。

sentences.english: Both men had direct contact with dead chickens when feeding carcasses to their dogs.
sentences.chinese: 这两名男子均在将死鸡尸体喂狗时直接接触了死鸡。

sentences.english: Two jockeys were thrown in the second race.
sentences.chinese: 有两个骑师在第二场赛马时摔了下来。

sentences.english: Temperature distribution was tested along thickness direction of Dendrocalamus giganteus timber under different hot pressing temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 测定了龙竹竹材在不同热压温度下干燥时的温度分布。

sentences.english: Some years ago, a good family moved into the third floor apartment of the tenement where we lived in the Bronx.
sentences.chinese: 多年前，我们住在布朗克斯时，三楼搬来一家新租户。

sentences.english: Reductions in staffing at the major banks.
sentences.chinese: 在裁减人员时的主要银行。

sentences.english: He felt browned off when he heard that he waw dismissed.
sentences.chinese: 当他听到自己被解职时感到很不痛快。

sentences.english: When a young man reached 18 or 20 years old, the capping ceremony would be held.
sentences.chinese: 一个年轻的男人十八岁或二十岁时，要举行冠礼。

sentences.english: You hurt my feelings by betraying me when I'm in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 你太伤我感情了，居然在我身陷困境之时背叛了我。

sentences.english: Adjust the density (amount of ink) of the print.
sentences.chinese: 调整打印时墨点的密度。

sentences.english: When the wind blows , the slender tree bends but never breaks.
sentences.chinese: 起风时，这棵细长的树常弯曲但决不会断。

sentences.english: So watch out for these tests because they happen all the time。
sentences.chinese: 所以，要当心这些测试，因为它们无时不在。

sentences.english: When the markets opened the following Monday, the Dow bid adieu to 10000 for good.
sentences.chinese: 股市在紧接着的周一开盘时就告别了10000点。

sentences.english: I hope to be available for the Coppa Italia match against Udinese. I remain confident.
sentences.chinese: 希望在意大利杯对阵乌迪内斯的比赛时我能复出吧。

definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
